featured.description: Whether the blog post is featured. Only present if true.

title.description: The title of the blog post.

category.description: The category slug for the blog post. Must be one of: microsoft-open-source-blog, aws, azure-cosmos-db-blog, yugabytedb-blog.

description.description: A short summary or description of the blog post.

tags.description: A list of tags associated with the blog post.

uri.description: The URI to the full article.
